Package org.forgerock.openidm.smartevent.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PluggablePublisher
    Allows to plug in event publishers, and replace them dynamically
    StatisticsHandlerMBean
    This MBean interface is expected to change!!!
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockingPublisher
    Publisher that uses the blocking linked queue to process events.
    DisabledEventEntry
    Used when event publishing is disabled Empty method calls may get optimized out by the JIT
    DisabledPublisher
    Used when event publishing is disabled Empty method calls may get optimized out by the JIT
    DisruptorReferringEventEntry
    Ring buffer event entry for the disruptor Used to prepopulate the ring buffer with a (fixed) number of entries for the purpose of processing the associated EventEntry
    DisruptorReferringPublisher
    Publisher that uses the disruptor pattern and RingBuffer to process events in a highly concurrent manner.
    DisruptorShortEventEntry Deprecated
    Considering removal as it limits the number of open start events to the ring buffer size.
    DisruptorShortPublisher Deprecated
    Considering removal as it limits the number of open start events to the ring buffer size Plus it is highly sensitive to requiring end() to be called on the EventEntry
    EventEntryImpl
    Event entry implementation exposed to the user
    MonitoringInfo
    Holds monitoring and statistics info
    StatisticsHandler
    Event handler for monitoring and statistics Expects a single thread assigned to gather the statistics
